explains: n. 上升；增加；向上摆动
vi. 提高；回升；向上摆动

sentences.en: It seems like they're on the upswing.
sentences.cn: 它似乎正处于上升时期。

sentences.en: Burglaries in our town have been on the upswing.
sentences.cn: 我们小城里的入室盗窃案一直在上升。

sentences.en: The upswing in demand for wet nurses is raising moral questions.
sentences.cn: 奶妈需求激增也引发了道德方面的问题。
